text: Kɨ men tongɨn ikia mirakelbagh ami, da gumazir igharazi tam faragha amizir puvatɨzir ingangariba. Ezɨ kɨ men tongɨn mirakelɨn kabagh amizir puvatɨzɨ, me arazir kurabar osɨmtɨziba puvatɨghai. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn me mirakelɨn kɨ amizibar ganigha gɨfa, egha me na ko Afeziam sara, gan aghuagha gan apanim gami.
